DOC.brief_title: Postmarketing Safety Study Q/LAIV Subjects 2 Through 49 Years Age
DOC.detailed_description: Children adult immunize Q/LAIV part routine clinical practice Kaiser Permanente Northern California ( NCKP ) sit . Using exist data healthcare utilization , rate medically attend event ( MAEs ) interest evaluate eligible Q/LAIV recipient vaccinate Kaiser Permanente ( KP ) Northern California Health Care Plan 2013-2014 influenza season . Enrollment must include minimum 10,000 child 2 8 year age ; base previous utilization FluMist NCKP , enrollment expect include approximately 80,000 child adult 2 49 year age .
DOC.criteria: 1. . Age 2 49 year time vaccination ( index date unvaccinated control ) 2. . Membership KP Health Care Plan least 12 month prior vaccination/index date 3. . Continuous enrollment KP Health Care Plan 6 month follow vaccination/index date .
